backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend files, components, and test mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing brief descriptions of many frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, base styles, and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file with a mount point and script entry for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all pages and includes a scroll‑to‑top handler.
frontend/src/components/blocks/AgeGroupS: Renders selectable age‑group buttons highlighting the active group.
frontend/src/components/blocks/Alternate: Displays Call and WhatsApp contact cards using soft card variants.
frontend/src/components/blocks/Compariso: Two‑column comparison table contrasting traditional education with Rainbowz.
Reusable CTA section with headline, optional subtext, and primary/secondary buttons.
frontend/src/components/blocks/DiagramPa: Panel showing a titled diagram with optional description and caption.
Accordion‑based FAQ list rendering questions and expandable answers.
frontend/src/components/blocks/FeatureGr: Responsive grid rendering FeatureCard items in 2–4 columns.
frontend/src/components/blocks/Geometric: Decorative geometric overlay elements for hero or section backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/blocks/Testimoni: Shows a three‑column grid of parent testimonials within a styled container.
frontend/src/components/forms/BookDemoFo: A demo booking form with validation, state handling, and a success message screen.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing brand info, navigation links, contact CTA, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Responsive navbar with active link highlighting, mobile menu, and demo CTA.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Overall page layout wrapping content with navbar and footer.
frontend/src/components/media/GeneratedI: Simple wrapper for rendering responsive lazy-loaded images.
frontend/src/components/media/ThinlineIc: Sprite-based icon component selecting positions for various cognitive-skill icons.
frontend/src/components/primitives/Butto: Wrapper around Shadcn button supporting variants, sizing, and ref forwarding.
Card wrapper with variants and a FeatureCard helper for icon-title-description blocks.
frontend/src/components/primitives/Conta: Layout container applying max-width and padding.
frontend/src/components/primitives/Secti: Section wrapper with spacing and optional tinted background.
frontend/src/components/primitives/Typog: Typography helpers for headings, subheadings, and body text with preset styles.
frontend/src/content/programs.ts: Defines program age groups with skills and structure plus related FAQ items.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Centralized marketing copy for hero, sections, outcomes, testimonials, and footer.
frontend/src/content/siteNav.ts: Navigation item definitions for primary site routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query backend hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with a structured color palette.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with sections on the company story, philosophy, research principles, and safety standards.
frontend/src/pages/ContactBookDemoPage.t: Displays a demo booking page with a form, location map placeholder, and alternate contact options.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with hero content, feature sections, testimonials, and final CTA using siteCopy data.
frontend/src/pages/OurMethodPage.tsx: Explains the training system with diagrams, skill descriptions, techniques, and age‑wise development content.
frontend/src/pages/ParentsGuidePage.tsx: Renders the Parents’ Guide page with hero text, article cards, learning habits, and an FAQ section using shared UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Displays program details by age group with a selector, skills, weekly structure, CTA, and a program FAQ section.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsOutcomesPage.t: Shows outcomes with a hero, typical improvements grid, and parent story cards using shared components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, goals, architecture, required pages, design system notes, and image requirements.
